name: Brain Training 11++
description:
This game will be turned off by overlapping of two cards so that the total number of theme given to each stage.

Example) In the case of stage 11.
So that the total is 11 by overlapping two cards.
[2] + [9]
[4] + [7]
etc.

50 pieces in total card!

Clearing conditions is to get a star more than one.
If the Stars can get you proceed to the next stage.

Acquisition conditions of the stars, as follows

Star less than one 150 seconds
Star less than two 50 seconds
Three stars average less than 40 seconds (average of the last 3 times)
